abstract: Executives from Research in Motion and AT&T unveiled a new smartphone called the BlackBerry Torch.
snippet: Executives from Research in Motion and AT&T unveiled a new smartphone called the BlackBerry Torch.
lead_paragraph: At a press conference in downtown Manhattan on Tuesday, executives from AT&T and Research In Motion, makers of the BlackBerry line of smartphones, introduced the BlackBerry Torch, the company’s first phone with both a touch screen and a slide-out keyboard.

headline.main: Research In Motion Brings the Torch to AT&T
